sentences.sentence: God welcomes the sinner who repents.
He repents having compensated the dispensable pension for fear of penalty.
sentences.translation: 他后悔因害怕处罚而补偿了不必要的养老金。

sentences.sentence: Anyone who permits men and women to work or study together is an apostate and should be put to death unless he repents, said Sheikh Abdulrahman al-Barrak.
sentences.translation: 任何敢于允许男人和女人在一起工作或学习的人，都是叛教者，应当被处死，除非他作出忏悔，谢赫·阿卜杜阿赫曼·阿尔巴拉克表示。
